author: Ubisoft
description:
Take on the appearance of Yoshiro the Damned, an Orochi corrupted by the Mamono Dagger who must destroy the Jorogumo.

About For Honor:
Carve a path of destruction through the battlefield fighting for guts, glory, and survival in For Honor. Enter the chaos of a raging war as a Hero from some of the greatest warrior legacies ever known. For Honor is a fast-paced and immersive experience, mixing skill with visceral, never-before-seen melee combat.

Enjoy incredible seasonal content, engaging campaign and thrilling multiplayer with friends online, in split screen two-player co-op, or solo against AI.

#Ubisoft #ForHonor 

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

© 2025 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered trademarks in the US and/or other countries.
title: For Honor: Content Of The Week - October 23

author: Ubisoft
description: Don't miss the Hungry for Yokai Emote and the Yokai Hunter Execution. Available until Nov 13th!
title: Hungry for Yokai Emote and Yokai Hunter Execution available until November 13th!

author: Ubisoft
description:

Wait, what's that at 4:43 👀 ?

From a brand-new Parkour Update to the challenging Corrupted Castles, plus two Story Drops and even more surprises on the way, there's plenty to look forward to in the coming months !

About Assassin's Creed Shadows:
In Assassin’s Creed Shadows, you will live the intertwined stories of Naoe, an adept shinobi Assassin from Iga Province, and Yasuke, the powerful African samurai of historical legend. Against the backdrop of the turbulent late Sengoku period, this remarkable duo will discover t
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Fall Roadmap Update

author: Ubisoft
description:
Treasures rise from the depths...
This season's Smuggler Pass brings the new Sloop of War, the furry Chaos Bard, cosmetic rewards, and much more!

About Skull and Bones:
Enter the perilous world of Skull and BonesTM, where you play by your own rules to rise from a nobody to become the most fearsome pirate kingpin. Craft a variety of unique ships, forge unlikely alliances, and take part in thrilling naval battles as you overcome the odds and bring mayhem on the seas. Be part of an immersive world that introduces new challenges and features every season. 

#Ubisoft #SkullandBones
Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

© 2025 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered trademarks in the US and/or other countries.
title: Skull and Bones: Year 2 Season 3 Smuggler Pass Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description:
We've released a special video interview between Morbid Metal developer Felix Schade and Hideki Kamiya, creator of numerous classic titles!
The two game creators spoke extensively about action game development.

The full interview is also available on Famitsu.com and in Weekly Famitsu (October 30th issue, No. 1919).
Please check it out!

Sign up for the Steam Playtest now and experience Morbid Metal early!
🔥 Add to your Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1866130/Morbid_Metal/

Morbid Metal is a roguelite hack'n slash game in which you battle fearsome enemies in a dark sci-fi universe. Instantly switch characters to take advantage of their unique characteristics and perform devastating combos. Every victory makes you stronger, every defeat is an opportunity to progress.

Developed by Screenjuice in Unity and published by Ubisoft.
🔻 Follow the game for updates and exclusive content! 🔻
📌X: https://x.com/MorbidMetalGame
📌 BlueSky: https://web-cdn.bsky.app/profile/screen-ju
title: Morbid Metal Director & Kamiya Hideki – Special Interview

author: Ubisoft
description:
Step into the heart of the Roman Empire with Anno 117: Pax Romana and secure your Governor’s Edition here: https://www.anno117paxromana.com/governor-edition

Join several members of the Mainz studio as they unveil the contents of this premium collector’s set, crafted by the Anno community itself. From the majestic Amphitheatre 3D puzzle to the beautifully illustrated artbook, discover all the items and exclusive behind-the-scenes insights from the game’s development.

Anno 117: Pax Romana launches on November 13.

About Anno 117: Pax Romana:
In the latest instalment of the award-winning Anno strategy franchise, it’s your destiny to shape the Roman Empire in the year 117 AD. As governor, will you encourage economic growth or expand your rule through dominance? Lead with rebellion or unite a diverse culture? 
The cost of peace is yours to decide.

Learn more about Ubisoft: www.ubisoftgroup.com

© 2025 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registere
title: Anno 117: Pax Romana - Official Governor’s Edition Unboxing

author: Ubisoft
description: Advanced Parkour, Corrupted Castles, New Story Drops - dive into all the latest Assassin's Creed Shadows reveals now with our new Fall Roadmap! 🍂
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Fall Roadmap!

author: Ubisoft
description:
Naoe and Yasuke are sneaking and slashing their way to Nintendo Switch™ 2 on December 2nd !

Enter the breathtaking world of Feudal Japan! Unleash your inner Assassin as Naoe, a stealthy and cunning shinobi,  and strike from the shadows. Or take command as Yasuke, a towering samurai, and dominate the battlefield.

 Whether you're a new player discovering Assassin's Creed Shadows, or a returning shinobi ready for more, we can't wait to take you to feudal Japan ! Enjoy cross-progression and touchscreen support in all menus - including world map, store and hideout - whether you're at home or on the go!

Learn more: https://www.assassincreed.com/shadows
Watch more: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBnrd5k2F2IOOjoz62wdQntPrz6D0xjWq

Follow the Assassin’s Creed pages to get the latest news on Shadows:

title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Nintendo Switch™ 2 Announce Trailer
